## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                       | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Default           |
| ---------- | ----------- | --------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| `color`    | `color`     | Basic text list color variations. | `"inherit" \| "neutral-grey-1" \| "neutral-grey-2" \| "neutral-grey-3" \| "neutral-grey-4" \| "neutral-grey-5" \| "neutral-grey-6" \| "neutral-grey-7" \| "neutral-grey-8" \| "porsche-black" \| "porsche-light" \| "porsche-red"` | `'porsche-black'` |
| `listType` | `list-type` | The type of the text list.        | `"ordered" \| "unordered"`                                                                                                                                                                                                         | `'unordered'`     |
| `textType` | `text-type` | The style of the text list.       | `"copy" \| "small" \| "12" \| "16" \| "18" \| "20" \| "24" \| "28" \| "30" \| "32" \| "36" \| "42" \| "44" \| "48" \| "52" \| "60" \| "60-thin" \| "62" \| "62-thin" \| "72" \| "72-thin" \| "84" \| "84-thin"`                    | `'copy'`          |
